data.question: What is the highest reversible SO2 adsorption capacity reported among the materials studied?
Which MOF has no open metal sites but still shows SO2 adsorption?
Is the SO2 adsorption in MFM-190(F) reversible?
Does MFM-190(F) suffer from structural degradation upon soaking in water?
What is the role of small pore diameters in low-pressure SO2 uptake according to the study?
data.answer: Small pore diameters are important for low-pressure SO2 uptake.

data.question: Which MOF exhibits the highest dynamic selectivity for SO2/CO2 mixture?
What is the BET surface area of MFM-101?
Is MFM-190(CH3) stable towards SO2 sorption?
What technique was used for the in situ FT-IR microscopy studies?
data.answer: Bruker Hyperion 3000 microscope in transmission mode

data.question: What is the effect of functional groups on the framework stability of MFM-190 series towards SO2 adsorption?
data.answer: The introduction of functional groups like -F enhances the framework stability towards SO2 adsorption.

data.question: Does the presence of open metal sites contribute to the high SO2 adsorption capacity in MFM-190(F)?
What is the role of ligand functionalization in SO2 adsorption according to the study?
data.answer: Ligand functionalization, along with open metal sites and pore geometry, enhances SO2 adsorption.

data.question: Which MOF shows the highest reversible SO2 adsorption in porous solids to date according to the study?
Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-190(F) higher than that of MFM-190(NO2)?
What is the significance of the -F group in MFM-190(F) for SO2 adsorption?
data.answer: The -F group enhances the framework stability and provides additional binding sites for SO2.

data.question: What is the dynamic selectivity of SO2/CO2 for MFM-101?
Does MFM-126 show stable performance over multiple cycles of SO2 adsorption-desorption?
What is the role of open Cu(II) sites in SO2 adsorption in MFM-190(F)?
data.answer: Open Cu(II) sites are identified as the strongest adsorption sites for SO2.

data.question: Is the SO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-190(F) affected by the presence of water?
data.answer: MFM-190(F) suffers from structural degradation upon soaking in water, which may affect its SO2 adsorption capacity.
